definitions.definition: Any of the North American hawk species ( Cooper's hawk , sharp-shinned hawk and red-tailed hawk ), or counterparts elsewhere, mistakenly believed to be pests .
A draft dodger , especially in the Vietnam War , who nonetheless currently supports United States overseas military engagements.
An older, usually more powerful man who preys on adolescent boys for sex.

main_definition: Any of the North American hawk species ( Cooper's hawk , sharp-shinned hawk and red-tailed hawk ), or counterparts elsewhere, mistakenly believed to be pests .
secondary_definitions: ( US politics , derogatory ) A draft dodger , especially in the Vietnam War , who nonetheless currently supports United States overseas military engagements.
( derogatory , gay slang ) An older, usually more powerful man who preys on adolescent boys for sex.
